actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution relating to Canal Zone sovereignty and jurisdiction.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the House of Representatives that the Government of the United States should maintain and protect its sovereign rights and jurisdiction over said Canal Zone and Panama Canal and that the United States Government should in no way cede, dilute, forfeit, negotiate, or transfer any of these sovereign rights, power, authority, jurisdiction, territory, or property to any other sovereign nation or to any international organization which sovereign rights, power, authority, jurisdiction, territory, and other property are indispensably necessary for the protection and security of the United States and the entire Western Hemisphere, including the Canal and Panama.

titles.title: A resolution relating to Canal Zone sovereignty and jurisdiction.
